description: Join the numbers and get to the 2048 tile! Simple and addictive puzzle game.

title: Flappy Bird
description: Guide the bird through pipes by tapping. Classic arcade game that tests your reflexes.

title: Tetris
description: Classic tetris game. Arrange falling blocks to create complete rows.

description: Control a snake to eat food and grow longer without hitting walls or yourself.

description: Navigate Pac-Man through a maze, eating dots and avoiding ghosts.
